text: Mir Zafarullah Khan Jamali (Urdu/Baloch: میر ظفراللہ خان جمالی) (January 1, 1944 - December 2, 2020) was a Pakistani politician and businessman. He was the 15th Prime Minister of Pakistan from 2002 to 2004. He was the chairman of the Pakistan Hockey Federation. Mir Zafarullah Khan Jamali was born in present-day Balochistan, Pakistan. Jamali died of a heart attack on December 2, 2020 in Rawalpindi, Pakistan at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Pakistan Category:Pakistani Muslims Category:Pakistani businesspeople Category:Politicians from Balochistan (Pakistan)
title: Zafarullah Khan Jamali
